author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENZO REMAINS POORLY ORGANIZED OVER THE TROPICAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...LORENZO REMAINS POORLY ORGANIZED OVER THE TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 PM AST Mon Oct 13 the center of Lorenzo was located near 15.2, -41.7 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENZO REMAINS POORLY ORGANIZED OVER THE TROPICAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 PM AST Mon Oct 13 the center of Lorenzo was located near 15.2, -41.7 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorenzo (AT2/AL122025)
